entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Your actions have helped Han Solo close a rift between himself and Nym.
entries.journal_entry_description: Help Han Solo reconcile himself with Nym so that he can try to convince Nym to aid the Rebel Alliance.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Han Solo wants you to do a favor for Nym and recover some stolen munitions and take out the leader of the pirates who took them. A transmission has been intercepted involving one of those Blood Razors. Han believes their camp to be somewhere in that general area from which that transmission originated.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You discovered that one of Nym's henchmen, Mahar Spince, helped the Blood Razor pirates in the theft. They signal a meeting with him by lighting a tiki torch on the outskirts of town. Light that torch and eliminate the traitorous henchman.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Eliminate Jorund Saleem, the leader of the Blood Razor pirates that stole Nym's munitions.
entries.task05_item_name: You recover a crate of stolen munitions
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Recover some munitions stolen from Nym by a group of Blood Razor pirates.
